post:
Hello LET community,

The **SecuredSpeed "Black Friday" Special**.

These are OpenVZ/SolusVM and will be provisioned at QuadraNET data centers in either **Los Angeles** or **Miami** (you get to choose).

**VPS plans from 96MB to 8GB in size**<br>
-All of our nodes are powered by **Dual E5 Xeons** & arrays of **SSD's** for caching. <br>
-Native IPv4/IPv6<br>
-Exclusive mobile android app<br>
-Gigabit uplinks<br>

User promo code "**BF2014D40**" to take 40%  off recurring on any monthly VPS plan.

User promo code "**BF2014D25**" to take 25%  off recurring on any semi-annual VPS plan.

[[Link to VPS Plans Here](http://securedspeed.com/)]

Examples:

<pre>
**VPS ONE**
96MB RAM
10GB RAID SSD Cached
500GB Gigabit Bandwidth Transfer
<del>$15/semi-annually</del> $11.25/semi-annually with Promo code
</pre>

<pre>
**VPS TWO**
256MB RAM
15GB RAID SSD Cached
750GB Gigabit Bandwidth Transfer
<del>$4/month</del> $2.40/month with Promo code
<del>$18/semi-annually</del> $13.50/semi-annually with Promo code
</pre>

<pre>
**VPS THREE**
512MB RAM
25GB RAID SSD Cached
750GB Gigabit Bandwidth Transfer
<del>$6/month</del> $3.60/month with Promo code
<del>$24/semi-annually</del> $18/semi-annually with Promo code
</pre>

<pre>
**VPS FOUR**
1GB RAM
35GB RAID SSD Cached
1TB Gigabit Bandwidth Transfer
<del>$10/month</del> $6/month with Promo code
<del>$48/semi-annually</del> $36/semi-annually with Promo code
</pre>


Only a **limited number** of uses on these promo codes are set, so grab them while they are still available. Available to new VPS orders from existing or new clients.

Payments via PayPal, Credit Card, or **Bitcoin**.

Looking Glass & Test IP's [**Miami**]: http://mia.testfile.securedspeed.com<br>
Looking Glass & Test IP's [**Los Angeles**]: http://lax.testfile.securedspeed.com

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us thought our website contact page (staff is not always watching the forums).

Thanks for all the great support and feedback over the years :) Enjoy.
